page.title: 15A Day In The Life Of Daniel
page.content:
A Day In The Life Of Daniel
I usually get up at about six in the morning.I have cereal for breakfast.I have a wash.We set off for school at quarter to nine.School starts at nine. We go to assembly and then come in for maths.At half past ten we have first play.When we come in we have English or split classes.At twelve we have our dinner and go out to play.We sometimes have P.E.After that we have another play.Then we have television and go home.When my sister comes home I have my tea.I go out to play.I come in about eight.We come in and get ready for bed.When we are ready we go and watch television until nine. At nine we go to bed.In bed I sometimes read a book or I just go to sleep.
